title: Zero-Waste Garnish & Juice Program
system_mod: Emphasize yield tracking, repurposing byproducts, freezing strategy, and safe shelf-life. Include a weekly zero-waste scorecard and staff prep checklists.
venue_context: Craft cocktail bar producing 25L citrus weekly with variable fruit quality; limited cold storage; team wants greener practices without slowing service.
prompt: Design a zero-waste juice and garnish workflow: how to capture peels/pith/pulp, stabilize juice, pre-batch efficiently, and measure savings without sacrificing quality.
